nodes.text: Flare Two was the callsign assigned to the second pilot of the New Republic's Flare Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, an X-wing starfighter pilot was designated this callsign during the Battle of Jakku, where the squadron's X-wings were tasked with covering the bombers during their bombing runs on the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing's flagship, Yadeez.
Flare Two first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
